pkgmetadata.longdescription: Testing Differences Between Competing Risks Models and Their Visualisations // Tool for analyzing competing risks models. The main point of interest is testing differences between groups (as described in R.J Gray (1988) doi:10.1214/aos/1176350951 and J.P. Fine, R.J Gray (1999) doi:10.2307/2670170) and visualizations of survival and cumulative incidence curves.
